Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.development

Class ProductionManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.development.ProductionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies
public class ProductionManager extends Object implements AcceptsSupplies
Manages all of those depots that can contain resources both from the strongbox and the depots, namely production depots, leader production depots and paycheck

  • Method Details

    • addSupply

      public void addSupply​(DepotID slot, WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from) throws SupplyException
      Adds the supply to the specified storage. Information about the source of the object needed. Beforehand the corresponding additionAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      addSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      slot - Storage to add the supply to
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      from - Source of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot accept the supply

    • removeSupply

      Specified by:
      removeSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      slot - Storage to remove the supply from
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      to - Destination of the supply

    • clearSupplies

      public Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies()
      Removes all of the supplies.
      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.

    • clearSupplies

      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • removeFromSourceContainers

      private Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> removeFromSourceContainers​(SupplyContainer toRemove)
      Removes the resources from the source containers (first try to remove from strongbox, then from depots)
      Parameters:
      toRemove - the SupplyContainer to empty
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.

    • produce

      public SupplyContainer produce​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3, boolean l1, boolean l2, boolean base)
      Activates production in the specified production spaces
      Parameters:
      s1 - Development space 1
      s2 - Development space 2
      s3 - Development space 3
      l1 - Leader 1 production (if leader 1 has that ability)
      l2 - Leader 2 production (if leader 2 has that ability)
      base - Production of the board
      Returns:
      Returns the sum of the output of the active productions

    • checkProduction

      public void checkProduction​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3, boolean l1, boolean l2, boolean base) throws SupplyException
      Checks if the production in the specified productions spaces can be triggered
      Parameters:
      s1 - Development space 1
      s2 - Development space 2
      s3 - Development space 3
      l1 - Leader 1 production (if leader 1 has that ability)
      l2 - Leader 2 production (if leader 2 has that ability)
      base - Production of the board
      Throws:
      SupplyException - if the supplies on the productions spaces are not the right amount

    • swapBaseProduction

      public void swapBaseProduction​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException
      Swaps one of the mutable inputs/outputs of the base production.
      Parameters:
      i - 0 = first input, 1 = second input, 2 = output
      wot - new supply to insert
      Throws:
      SupplyException - A faith marker or no type supply type was added

    • swapLeaderProduction

      public void swapLeaderProduction​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException, NoSuchMethodException, LeaderException
      Swaps the only mutable output in the specified leader
      Parameters:
      i - number of leader
      wot - new supply to insert
      Throws:
      SupplyException - A no type supply type was added
      NoSuchMethodException - Specified leader is not a Producer
      LeaderException - Specified leader is not active or is discarded

    • getAllowedDepots

      public ArrayList<DepotID> getAllowedDepots​(DepotID from, WarehouseObjectType type)
      Returns the depots that can receive the specified supply.
      Parameters:
      from - Source of the supply
      type - Type of the supply
      Returns:
      The depots that can receive the specified supply

    • getSource

      public int getSource​(WarehouseObjectType wot)
      Returns an integer that indicates the source of the given WarehouseObjectType.
      Parameters:
      wot - a WarehouseObjectType
      Returns:
      0 if the given WarehouseObjectType isn't contained in any production depot, 1 if there are at least two different given WarehouseObjectType, one from a depot and the other from the coffer, 2 if the given WarehouseObjectType is from a depot, 3 if the given WarehouseObjectType is from the coffer
